# Modal 组件在手机上使用时出现样式错误

### Reproduction link

[https://ant.design/components/modal-cn](https://ant.design/components/modal-cn)

### Steps to reproduce

1. 手机打开 antd modal 官网
2. 点击demo出现modal

### What is expected?

modal样式在手机上正常呈现

### What is actually happening?

1. 关闭按钮错位
2. modal位置未居中

| Environment | Info                  |
| ----------- | --------------------- |
| antd        | 5.3.0                 |
| React       | 18                    |
| System      | ios16.3.1             |
| Browser     | chrome 110.0.5481.114 |
